Articles.Content: when I downloaded the 0.23 update I done the usual and installed my mods, kethane, interstellar, the usual. but now i cant view any useful information on the parts because it doesn't have anything in them so for a person new to the mods or new parts they would think it would be a problem as giant kethane canisters cant hold anything because it doesn't show information about how much it can carry. i know you can just put it on the ship and load it in to see the amount, but the loading takes time and for just knowing the storage amount of a part seems a waste of time. all I'm suggesting is that the maximum amount they can hold should also be displayed to avoid confusion
This sounds like a problem you need to take up with the mod author. Since this section is for suggestions for KSP only, I'll close the thread.
